# Plurality Tokyo

> Plurality Tokyoは、分散型技術や多様性、包括性に焦点を当てたコミュニティEventsです。技術革新と社会の多様性について議論し、新しいアイデアや関係性を育むプラットフォームを提供しています。

Plurality Tokyoは、技術とコミュニティの交差点にあるEventsシリーズです。私たちは、Web3、分散型技術、そして多様で包括的な未来に関する対話を促進します。

## Events

- [Future Tech Summit 2024](/events/future-tech-summit-2024.html.md): 2025/12/10にTokyo, Roppongi Hillsで開催。International summit exploring the future of technology and plurality
- [Plurality Practice Workshop 2024](/events/plurality-workshop-2024.html.md): 2024/8/15にTokyo, Shibuyaで開催。Workshop for learning practical methods of digital democracy
- [Glen in Japan 2024](/events/glen-in-japan-2024.html.md): 2024/5/20にTokyo, Japanで開催。A series of talks and workshops by Glen Weyl on Plurality, Digital Democracy, and the Future of Governance
- [Funding the Commons Tokyo 2024](/events/funding-the-commons-tokyo-2024.html.md): 2024/5/17にTokyo, Japanで開催。A three-day conference exploring innovative funding mechanisms for public goods, with a focus on Japan and Asia
- [April 23 Meetup](/events/april-23-meetup-2024.html.md): 2024/4/23にTokyo, Japanで開催。A casual meetup for Plurality enthusiasts to discuss and share ideas

## 記事

- [The Future of Web3 and Decentralized Society](/articles/web3-future.html.md): An exploration of how Web3 technologies are transforming society
- [The Future of AI and Creativity](/articles/ai-creativity.html.md): An analysis of how AI impacts creative work
- [New Forms of Organizational Management with DAOs](/articles/dao-governance.html.md): Innovations in organizational management brought by Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs)

## スピーカー

- [Glen Weyl](/speakers/glen-weyl.html.md): Principal Fellow at Microsoft, Founder of RadicalxChange at Microsoft, RadicalxChange

- [過去のEventsアーカイブ](/events/index.html.md): 過去に開催された全てのEvents記録
- [すべての記事](/articles/index.html.md): 公開されている全ての記事
